content: continue knitting in rounds until 5 sts remain on needles 1 and 3 20 sts around foot k 10 rounds add sts on needle 1 to those on needle 3 now there are 2 needles with 10 sts on each needle toe round 1 needle 1 k1 ssk k to last 3 sts k2 decrease k1 repeat for needle 2 round 2 k repeat these two rounds until 6 sts remain on each needle ending with round 1 kitchner stitch to close the toe https //youtu be/efhxnvfmobe make a hanging loop using the beginning tail chain 30 join to sock top work in ends ©marilyn allison november 2021
